trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of event that is expected

Levels.new_bloc_relational: a Relational block is about to start
Levels.new_bloc_control: a Control block is about to start
Levels.Relational: a block in which to compare the within-pair relation between two pairs of images
Levels.Control: a block in which to compare the bottom image to the pair on top

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

duration.Description: Duration of the stimulus in seconds

stim_file.Description: Path and name of the image file presented

instruction.Description: Instructions to be followed in the current trial

Levels.Texture: a block in which left hand movement is required is about to start

nbloc.Description: Progressive number of the block performed

trial.Description: Progressive number of the trial performed

response_time.Description: Time taken to provide the answer

countdown_stim.Description: If used, decreasing number shown on the screen during the get-ready phase of the task
